atlantic.title: The End of Public-Employee Unions?
atlantic.topComment: The end of the unions' ability to extort money from the taxpayers would be one of the biggest steps forward in sustainable governance in my lifetime.

atlantic.title: The Danger of Being Neighborly Without a Permit
atlantic.topComment: You've got to lead a pretty sad, boring life if you're making a personal mission out of destroying a mailbox-sized book exchange. And the city officials who indulge your pettiness are as pathetic as you are. Get. A. Life.

atlantic.title: My 2015 Oscar Predictions
atlantic.topComment: The real question is how many articles will The Atlantic publish about white privilege and white supremacy if Selma doesn't win.
